attributes.additional_details:
This breaks the UK principles on the Rule of Law and breaks international law.

Please stop the government from gambling with our economy and principles, probably to line certain cabinet members, including Boris Johnston's, pockets. This would be absolutely scandalous!

Please read this well referenced article:
https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/why-dominic-cummings-so-important-lloyd-hardy
The REAL reason why the government wants a no deal Brexit!
attributes.background:
Halt the Internal Markets Bill and stop the government from:
1) Breaking international law
2) Crashing out of the EU with no deal
3) Risking the Good Friday Agreement and peace in Ireland
4) Damaging UK principles of the Rule of Law
5) Damaging international relations globally
